std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Elisabeth Louisa vd Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Colesberg, Baptism register, 1837-1843. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G16 3/2. Note: Colesberg established 1826 from Graaff-Reinet. Transcribed by Annelie Els, independently, from Pretoria Archives FK 2277
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with berg anywhere in the surname with Elisabeth Louisa anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Elisabeth Louisa vd Berg baptism on 11 Jul 1841 (born 8 Oct 1840), daughter of Abraham Paulus vd Berg & Cornelia Gertruida Margaritha Steyn.

std_narrative.citation:
Elisabeth, daughter of Abraham Paulus vd Berg & Cornelia Gertruida Margaritha Steyn, was born on 8 October 1840 and baptised on 11 July 1841. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Elisabeth Louisa vd Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Colesberg, Baptism register, 1837-1843. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G16 3/2. Note: Colesberg established 1826 from Graaff-Reinet. Transcribed by Annelie Els, independently, from Pretoria Archives FK 2277
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with berg anywhere in the surname with Elisabeth Louisa anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Elisabeth Louisa vd Berg baptism on 11 Jul 1841 (born 8 Oct 1840), daughter of Abraham Paulus vd Berg & Cornelia Gertruida Margaritha Steyn.
